Crypto API

SHA1

The following functions perform the SHA1 Hash computation
  • SHA1()
  • SHA1_Init()
  • SHA1_Update()
  • SHA1_Final()
Following SHA APIs support multiple calls. For multiple call documentation please check sha directory.
  • SHA256()
  • SHA224()
  • SHA384()
  • SHA512()

    MD5

    The following functions perform the MD5 Hash computation
  • MD5()
  • MD5_Init()
  • MD5_Update()
  • MD5_Final()

    HMAC

    The following functions perform the HMAC Hash computation
  • HMAC()
  • HMAC_Init()
  • HMAC_Update()
  • HMAC_Final()

    DES and 3DES Encryption/Decryption

    The following functions can be used for DES Encryption/Decryption
  • DES_set_key_checked()
  • DES_ede3_cbc_encrypt()
  • DES_ncbc_encrypt()

    AES Encryption/Decryption

    The following functions can be used for AES Encryption/Decryption
  • AES_set_encrypt_key()
  • AES_set_decrypt_key()
  • AES_cbc_encrypt()
AES Counter mode
  • cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_encrypt()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_decrypt()
For Multiple call support
  • cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_encrypt_init()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_encrypt_update()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_encrypt_final()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_decrypt_init()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_decrypt_update()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_ctr_decrypt_final()
AES LRW
  • LRW_AES_set_key()
  • LRW_AES_ctx_encrypt()
  • LRW_AES_ctx_decrypt()

RC4

The following functions perform the RC4 Operations
  • RC4_set_key()
  • RC4()

    DSA

    The following functions perform the DSA Operations
  • DSA_generate_parameters()
  • DSA_generate_key()
  • DSA_sign()
  • DSA_verify()
  • DSA_do_sign()
  • DSA_do_verify()

    RSA

    The following functions perform the RSA Operations
  • RSA_generate_key()
  • RSA_sign()
  • RSA_verify()
  • RSA_public_encrypt()
  • RSA_private_decrypt()
  • RSA_private_encrypt()
  • RSA_public_decrypt()

    DH

    The following functions perform the Diffie-Hellman Operations
  • DH_generate_parameters()
  • DH_generate_key()
  • DH_compute_key()

    ModExp

    The following function perform Modular Exponentiation
  • cvm_ModExp()

    AES XCBC

  • cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_prf128()
For Multiple call support
  • cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_init()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_update()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_mac_final()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_prf128_init()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_prf128_update()
  • cvm_crypto_aes_xcbc_prf128_final()

    AES GCM

  • AES_GCM_encrypt()
  • AES_GCM_decrypt()
For Multiple call support
  • AES_GCM_init_key()
  • AES_GCM_set_iv()
  • AES_GCM_ctx_encrypt()
  • AES_GCM_ctx_decrypt()

    Generic API

    The following functions provide the abstraction layer to the crypto API
  • dh_generate_key_pair()
  • dh_generate_shared_secret()
  • rsa_create_key_pair()
  • rsa_encrypt_with_private_key()
  • rsa_decrypt_with_private_key()
  • rsa_encrypt_with_public_key()
  • rsa_decrypt_with_public_key()
  • hmac()
  • des_encrypt()
  • des_decrypt()
  • aes_encrypt()
  • aes_decrypt()

Crypto API for IPSec processing

  • Crypto API for IPSec processing
